(Fish out of water?)

::KitKat::

She yelped and sunk her teeth into the back of the neck of this fish.

The acid rain burned her skin.  It burned her eyes and ears.  It 
burned her nose and feet.  Her whole body burned int he rain.  But 
she wouldn't give up,.  She bit down again and again.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:

yourself."

acid
> rain he had extra mobility. (Don't ask why) He slid across the 
slick ground
> as it burnt his armor. He waited for KitKat to make the first move, 
but seen
> that she wanted him to move first. He slid toward and bit at her 
front
> leg...
